mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (category_id, writer, password, title, content) VALUES (#{categoryId}, #{writer}, #{password}, #{title}, #{content})
mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(article_id) FROM article WHERE 1=1
AND ( title like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR content like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') OR writer like CONCAT('%',#{searchWord},'%') )
AND category_id = #{categoryId}
AND created_date BETWEEN date(#{startDate}) AND date(#{endDate})+1
ORDER BY article_id DESC

SELECT article_id, category_id, (SELECT name FROM category WHERE category_id = article.category_id LIMIT 1) AS category_name, writer, password, title, content, view_count, created_date, modified_date, (SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM article_file WHERE article_id = article.article_id)) AS is_file_exist FROM article WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET writer = #{writer}, title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_date = current_timestamp() WHERE article_id = #{articleId} AND password = #{password}
